translations: v．取代，代替：在某人或某物的位置上替换或取代。
· The new technology supplanted the old one.

sentences.sentence: He may be supplanted by a younger man.
sentences.translation: 他可能会被一个年龄比他小的人取代。

sentences.sentence: By the 1930s the wristwatch had almost completely supplanted the pocket watch.
sentences.translation: 到了 20 世纪 30 年代，手表几乎完全取代了怀表。

sentences.sentence: It has been supplanted by the safer and more navigable bathyscaph.
sentences.translation: 它现已被更安全、更能航行的深海潜测艇所代替。
